title: Where to find when I first joined League?
body: I first joined in NA and moved to OCE when it was created. I want to find, preferably the exact date, of when I first joined League of Legends. Any help?

replies.body: This is critical account information unless you recorded it somewhere the only place to obtain it is the memory of the account creator.

Damn, I know I joined around the Diana and Rengar stage. I main Diana and thought it'd be cool if I joined with her without knowing it, but it's only a vague memory of her loading screen and very vivid one of Rengar's so maybe I just remember Diana's from seeing it other places.

You can clickon your profile on this website and scroll through all your match history

im unsure if it shows dates but its a start :)
The on site match history doesn't go back that far (if i recall, it only started being kept on site at the start of this year.)
for me it goes all the way back to my first game
I know I joined when Yasuo first came out. December 2013 I think?
Varus was knew when I joined. So when was that about?

Well if you think you joined around the stage when diana and rengar got released, its possible that you joined between 8/7/2012-8/20/2012 (MM/DD/YYYY) http://www.lolking.net/champions
Look at the released tab.
